DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project compare performance Pediatric Vision Scanner ( PVS ) Gold Standard Examination determine effectiveness PVS detect amblyopia strabismus .
DOC.brief_title: Amblyopia Strabismus Detection Using Pediatric Vision Scanner
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 26 year old complete ophthalmic examination include cycloplegic refraction conduct day within 3 month strabismic , anisometropic , normal ( normal eye examination refractive error accord AAPOS guideline ) parent provide informed consent Exclusion : ocular disease ( include medium opacity , anomalous optic nerve , ptosis , lid hemangioma , conjunctivitis , blepharitis , symptomatic NLD ) systemic disease ( JIA , JRA , neurofibromatosis ) developmental delay strabismus surgery past 6 month
